title: Fontes (Bataria das)
body: It was handed over to the Municipal Council in March 1898, and was demolished to improve the lands to the west of the old Praça da Rainha, now Praça do Marquês de Pombal. (1921). See Fortifications.

1898: Handed over to the Municipal Council
1921: Demolished to improve the lands to the west of the old Praça da Rainha, now Praça do Marquês de Pombal
